ARABIC: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And We left a Sign in it for those who fear the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We left a sign in this for those who fear the grievous punishment,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and We left therein a Sign for those who fear the grievous chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We left therein evidence for those who fear the painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And We kept a sign remaining in it, for those who fear the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have left there a sign for those who fear the painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And therein We left a sign to those who fear the painful chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We left behind therein a portent for those who fear a painful doom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and We left therein a sign for those who fear a painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the afflictive torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and We have left therein a sign for those who fear a painful punishment.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We left there a Sign for such as fear the Grievous Penalty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We have left there a sign (i.e. the place of the Dead Sea, well-known in Palestine) for those who fear the painful torment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We left in it a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We left therein a sign for those who fear the painful punishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:37] And We left therein, after destroying the disbelievers, a sign, an indication of their destruction, for those who fear the painful chastisement, so that they may not do what these [sinners] did.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We left behind therein) in the townships of Lot's folk (a portent) a sign and lesson (for those who fear a painful doom) in the Hereafter such that they do not emulate their abominable act.
